divs: Sighting Detailsvery bright reddish light that hovered, moved from side to side, and disappeared in the distance at rapid speeds I was looking up at the eastern sky and there was nothing. it was a clear morning. Then a bright reddish light lit up the sky to the northeast.It hovered for a while and moved from side to side and would disappear and reappear in the same relative location in the sky. After about 3 min. it flew away. As it flew awaay, the bright light began to blink. I recorded it on my camera and have it on videotape.
Summary: very bright reddish light that hovered,
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around September 22nd 2006
